attributes.action: ensure there is legal action taken against any MP, regardless of party or position, who has defrauded the taxpayer by claiming expenses they were not strictly entitled to claim.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am concerned that the Prime Minister and Parliament will endeavour to protect MP's from action which would be taken against normal members of the public who commit what are clearly acts of criminality ie fraud and false accounting.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
